member.name: WICPersistOptions
member.summary: Specifies Windows Imaging Component (WIC) options that are used when initializing a component with a stream.

member.name: WICPersistOptions.WICPersistOptionDefault
member.summary: The default persist options. The default is WICPersistOptionLittleEndian.

member.name: WICPersistOptions.WICPersistOptionLittleEndian
member.summary: The data byte order is little endian.

member.name: WICPersistOptions.WICPersistOptionBigEndian
member.summary: The data byte order is big endian.

summary.para: The data format must strictly conform to the specification.
summary.div: Warning This option is inconsistently implement and should not be relied on.

summary.para: No cache for the metadata stream.
Certain operations, such as require that the reader have a stream. Therefore, these operations will be unavailable if the reader is initialized with WICPersistOptionNoCacheStream.
Use UTF8 instead of the default UTF16.
summary.div: Note This option is currently unused by WIC.
